response.original_title: Loreena McKennitt - The Mask and Mirror
response.overview: An enchanting musical performance, set beneath the stars in the breathtaking Moorish heart of medieval Spain. Captured in concert in September 2003. singer / composer Loreena McKennitt leads viewers through the multi-textured landscapes of her catalogue. from traditional Celtic ballads to literary narratives and highlights from her latest recording, An Ancient Muse.
response.title: Loreena McKennitt - The Mask and Mirror
